title: How to Make Frosting
description:
This quick video will give you some tips on how to make frosting!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Frosting

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make vanilla buttercream frosting first add 1 cup 220 grams of room-temperature butter to a large mixing bowl then beat the butter with an electric mixer for 5 minutes which will make it light and airy next add three cups 375 grams of sifted confectioner sugar in one cup 125 grams increments beating the mixture for one minute after each addition finished by beating in 1 TSP 5 milliliters of vanilla and 2 tablespoons 30 milliliters of milk if you want to make chocolate buttercream frosting first beat 1 cup 220 grams of room-temperature butter in a large mixing bowl for 5 minutes then beat in 5 cups 625 grams of confectioner's sugar adding the sugar in 3 batches until the butter and sugar are fully combined when you add the last third of the sugar beat in 1/2 cup 50 grams of cocoa powder to finish your frosting by beating in half a cup 120 milliliters of milk and 1 teaspoon 5 milliliters of vanilla extract you can gradually mix in more milk if your frosting is too thickto make vanilla buttercream frosting first add 1 cup 220 grams of room-temperature butter to a large mixing bowl then beat the butter with an electric mixer for 5 minutes which will make it light and airy next add three cups 375 grams of sifted confectioner sugar in one cup 125 grams increments beating the mixture for one minute after each addition finished by beating in 1 TSP 5 milliliters of vanilla and 2 tablespoons 30 milliliters of milk if you want to make chocolate buttercream frosting first beat 1 cup 220 grams of room-temperature butter in a large mixing bowl for 5 minutes then beat in 5 cups 625 grams of confectioner's sugar adding the sugar in 3 batches until the butter and sugar are fully combined when you add the last third of the sugar beat in 1/2 cup 50 grams of cocoa powder to finish your frosting by beating in half a cup 120 milliliters of milk and 1 teaspoon 5 milliliters of vanilla extract you can gradually mix in more milk if your frosting is too thick

title: How to Make Gravy
description:
Learn How to Make Gravy with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Gravy

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make gravy first melt two tablespoons 30 grams of butter in a saucepan then add 1/4 cup 30 grams of flour to the saucepan and whisk the butter and flour together until small clumps form next add two cups 475 millilitres of stock you can use store-bought stock the drippings from the meat you've roasted or a combination of both whisk everything together over medium-high heat for 3 minutes or until the gravy thickens to give your gravy even more flavor season it with salt pepper and your favorite herbs before servingto make gravy first melt two tablespoons 30 grams of butter in a saucepan then add 1/4 cup 30 grams of flour to the saucepan and whisk the butter and flour together until small clumps form next add two cups 475 millilitres of stock you can use store-bought stock the drippings from the meat you've roasted or a combination of both whisk everything together over medium-high heat for 3 minutes or until the gravy thickens to give your gravy even more flavor season it with salt pepper and your favorite herbs before serving

subtitles: to make homemade hot chocolate first add 2 tablespoons 15 grams of cocoa powder and 2 tablespoons 25 grams of sugar into a saucepan then pour 1 cup 250 milliliters of milk and place the saucepan on a stovetop over medium-low heat whisk everything together until the mixture is hot but not boiling finally stir in 1/4 teaspoon 1 and 1/4 milliliters of vanilla extract pour your hot chocolate into a mug and enjoy at marshmallows or whipped cream to make your hot chocolate even sweeter to make spicy hot chocolate first chop 3 ounces 90 grams a bittersweet chocolate into small pieces then add the chocolate to a pot with 2 tablespoons 15 grams of cocoa powder 2 tablespoons 25 grams of sugar and 1/4 teaspoon 1 and 1/5 grams of ancho chili powder heat everything over medium-low heat until the chocolate begins to melt now add 2 cups 1/2 liter of milk to the pot and continue to heat while whisking everything together strain your hot chocolate into a mug and add a cinnamon stick for even more spiceto make homemade hot chocolate first add 2 tablespoons 15 grams of cocoa powder and 2 tablespoons 25 grams of sugar into a saucepan then pour 1 cup 250 milliliters of milk and place the saucepan on a stovetop over medium-low heat whisk everything together until the mixture is hot but not boiling finally stir in 1/4 teaspoon 1 and 1/4 milliliters of vanilla extract pour your hot chocolate into a mug and enjoy at marshmallows or whipped cream to make your hot chocolate even sweeter to make spicy hot chocolate first chop 3 ounces 90 grams a bittersweet chocolate into small pieces then add the chocolate to a pot with 2 tablespoons 15 grams of cocoa powder 2 tablespoons 25 grams of sugar and 1/4 teaspoon 1 and 1/5 grams of ancho chili powder heat everything over medium-low heat until the chocolate begins to melt now add 2 cups 1/2 liter of milk to the pot and continue to heat while whisking everything together strain your hot chocolate into a mug and add a cinnamon stick for even more spice

title: How to Make Homemade Wine

subtitles: to make your very own wine crush 16 cups of grapes or berries in a large crock once the crock is filled with fruit juice add a Campton tablet to get rid of any wild yeast and bacteria stir in 2 cups of honey to sweeten your wine and 1 packet of yeast to help your wine ferment when you're done cover the crock and store it in a warm location for three days then strain your wine and transfer it to a glass container for storageto make your very own wine crush 16 cups of grapes or berries in a large crock once the crock is filled with fruit juice add a Campton tablet to get rid of any wild yeast and bacteria stir in 2 cups of honey to sweeten your wine and 1 packet of yeast to help your wine ferment when you're done cover the crock and store it in a warm location for three days then strain your wine and transfer it to a glass container for storage

title: How to Make Iced Green Tea
description:
Learn how to make iced green tea with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Iced-Green-Tea

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: the easiest way to make ice green tea is to brew hot tea and cool it down start by boiling four cups of water in a large pot next take the pot off the stove and add four to six tea bags to the water let the tea steep for three minutes and then take the tea bags out of the water before putting it in the refrigerator after one to two hours fill four tall glasses with ice and pour the chilled tea over it you can also add honey to taste if you have any leftover tea store it in a mason jar in the refrigerator for three to five days to learn how to make cold brew green tea keep readingthe easiest way to make ice green tea is to brew hot tea and cool it down start by boiling four cups of water in a large pot next take the pot off the stove and add four to six tea bags to the water let the tea steep for three minutes and then take the tea bags out of the water before putting it in the refrigerator after one to two hours fill four tall glasses with ice and pour the chilled tea over it you can also add honey to taste if you have any leftover tea store it in a mason jar in the refrigerator for three to five days to learn how to make cold brew green tea keep reading

title: How to Make Iced Tea
description:
Learn how to make iced tea with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Iced-Tea

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make iced tea bring 2 cups of water to a boil then turn off the heat add 3-4 bags of your favorite black tea to the hot water and let them steep for 5 minutes before discarding them next transfer the tea to a large pitcher give it five to ten minutes to cool down then add two cups of cold water to dilute the strong flavor give the tea a good stir and refrigerate it for two to three hours once it's cold fill a tall glass with ice pour the tea into it and enjoy try adding lemon slices mint sprigs or sugar to boost the flavorto make iced tea bring 2 cups of water to a boil then turn off the heat add 3-4 bags of your favorite black tea to the hot water and let them steep for 5 minutes before discarding them next transfer the tea to a large pitcher give it five to ten minutes to cool down then add two cups of cold water to dilute the strong flavor give the tea a good stir and refrigerate it for two to three hours once it's cold fill a tall glass with ice pour the tea into it and enjoy try adding lemon slices mint sprigs or sugar to boost the flavor

subtitles: to make instant coffee start by microwaving one cup of water for one minute then in a separate mug add one to two tablespoons of instant coffee and one tablespoon of cold water the cold water will dissolve the coffee so it tastes better finally pour the hot water you microwaved into the mug and stir everything together with a spoon to learn how to make instant iced coffee or an instant latte scroll downto make instant coffee start by microwaving one cup of water for one minute then in a separate mug add one to two tablespoons of instant coffee and one tablespoon of cold water the cold water will dissolve the coffee so it tastes better finally pour the hot water you microwaved into the mug and stir everything together with a spoon to learn how to make instant iced coffee or an instant latte scroll down

title: How to Make Jam
description:
Learn how to make jam with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Jam

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make homemade jam first sterilize your canning jars by boiling them for 10 minutes rinse whatever fruit you want to use then chop it up and crush it with a spoon mix it with lemon juice and butter in a saucepan then bring it to a boil add sugar and let the mixture simmer for 5 to 20 minutes until it's syrupy ladle the jam into jars then seal and boil the jars in a large stock pot for 10 minutes remove them with tongs and let cool on the towel for 24 hours for a thicker consistency add pectin by following the package instructionsto make homemade jam first sterilize your canning jars by boiling them for 10 minutes rinse whatever fruit you want to use then chop it up and crush it with a spoon mix it with lemon juice and butter in a saucepan then bring it to a boil add sugar and let the mixture simmer for 5 to 20 minutes until it's syrupy ladle the jam into jars then seal and boil the jars in a large stock pot for 10 minutes remove them with tongs and let cool on the towel for 24 hours for a thicker consistency add pectin by following the package instructions

subtitles: to make kimchi combine cabbage strips and 1/4 cup 62 grams of salt in a bowl and let stand for two hours drain the broth into a separate Bowl and thoroughly rinse and dry the cabbage and mix garlic ginger sugar fish sauce red pepper flakes cabbage radish and scallions in a glass jar add the brine close the jar and let it ferment at room temperature for five days once it's fermented move the kimchi to the fridge for one week for specific ingredients and measurements read onto make kimchi combine cabbage strips and 1/4 cup 62 grams of salt in a bowl and let stand for two hours drain the broth into a separate Bowl and thoroughly rinse and dry the cabbage and mix garlic ginger sugar fish sauce red pepper flakes cabbage radish and scallions in a glass jar add the brine close the jar and let it ferment at room temperature for five days once it's fermented move the kimchi to the fridge for one week for specific ingredients and measurements read on

title: Raspberry Vodka and Soda-Fine Living
description: How to make a refreshing low-calorie cocktail.   This video is part of   Great Cocktails show   hosted by Stephen Phillips . SHOW DESCRIPTION :Did you know that rum contains more flavor components than any other spirit? Or that the latest behind-the-bar trend in swanky Manhattan steakhouses is called "molecular mixology"? From flaming buckets of Champagne to microbrews loaded with vitamins to Leningrad-themed vodka parties with fur coats and hats, FINE LIVING TV NETWORK's original series Great Cocktails is an expert guide to what to drink and where to drink it. Come along as we travel America to taste some of the hottest trends and the newest blends in the world of cocktails and entertaining.
subtitles: start with a rocks glass filled with ice add two ounces of raspberry infused vodka fill the rest of the glass with club soda not tonic give it a quick stir and garnish with a lime wedge and voila the raspberry vodka and sodastart with a rocks glass filled with ice add two ounces of raspberry infused vodka fill the rest of the glass with club soda not tonic give it a quick stir and garnish with a lime wedge and voila the raspberry vodka and soda
